mapper.select: SELECT /* select - AuthMapper.xml : 210917 @eunseo */ TMST.APV_REQ_SEQNO AS apvReqSeqno ,TMST.CERT_NO AS certNo FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MST.APV_REQ_TP_VAL ORDER BY MST.CRE_DTTM) AS MST_ROWNUM ,MST.APV_REQ_SEQNO ,MST.CERT_NO FROM ( SELECT A.APV_REQ_SEQNO ,A.APV_REQ_TP_VAL ,A.CERT_NO ,A.CRE_DTTM FROM TB_AUTH_L A WHERE A.APV_REQ_TP_VAL = #{apvReqTpVal} AND A.UNIX_TIME_APV_STRT_DTTM < #{checkApvTime} AND A.UNIX_TIME_APV_END_DTTM > #{checkApvTime} ORDER BY A.CRE_DTTM DESC ) MST ) TMST WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AUTH_L /* update - AuthMapper.xml : 210917 @eunseo */ SET CERT_CHCK_YN = 'Y' ,UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE APV_REQ_SEQNO = #{apvReqSeqno}
mapper.select: SELECT /* select - AuthMapper.xml : 210929 @eunseo */ L.MEM_ID AS memId ,L.PASSWORD AS password ,M.MEM_TP_CD AS memTpCd ,MT.MENTEE_ID AS menteeId FROM TB_LOGIN_I L LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER_L M ON M.MEM_ID = L.MEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENTEE_I MT ON MT.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND L.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId} AND M.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT /* select - AuthMapper.xml : 211008 @eunseo */ PASSWORD AS password FROM TB_LOGIN_I WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = #{memId}
SELECT /* select - AuthMapper.xml : 211014 @eunseo */ MENTO_ID AS mentoId FROM TB_MENTO_I WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MEM_ID = #{memId}
